name: AI-powered Sustainable Urban Mobility Feedback and Optimization Workflow
description: A workflow that collects real-time user feedback and transportation data to dynamically optimize eco-friendly transit routes and schedules using machine learning.

components.name: Real-time Data Ingestion
components.description: Integrates multiple real-time data sources such as vehicle GPS, traffic sensors, weather APIs, and public transit schedules.

components.name: User Feedback Collection
components.description: Collects user feedback through in-app surveys, mobile notifications, and web portals regarding transit experience, preferences, and issues.

components.name: Data Preprocessing
components.description: Cleanses and normalizes transportation data and user feedback for consistency and further analysis.

components.name: Feature Engineering
components.description: Extracts relevant features such as congestion patterns, user satisfaction metrics, and environmental impact indicators for model input.

components.name: Machine Learning Model Training
components.description: Trains predictive models including route optimization, demand forecasting, and user sentiment analysis to improve transit schedules.

components.name: Dynamic Route and Schedule Optimization
components.description: Uses trained models and real-time data to dynamically optimize eco-friendly transit routes and schedules for maximum efficiency and sustainability.

components.name: Feedback Loop & Continuous Learning
components.description: Continuously collects new data and feedback to refine models and update optimizations for evolving urban mobility needs.

components.name: Dashboard and Reporting
components.description: Visualizes key performance indicators, environmental impact stats, and optimization results for city planners and transit authorities.

goals: Optimize transit routes and schedules dynamically
Reduce carbon emissions from urban mobility
Enhance user satisfaction through continuous feedback
Leverage machine learning to predict and adapt to changing conditions
Provide actionable insights to transit authorities
